# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @return {Integer}
def sum_counts(nums)
    mod = 10**9 + 7
    n = nums.length
    last_position = Hash.new(-1)
    contribution = Array.new(n, 0)
    sum = 0
    
    nums.each_with_index do |num, i|
        contribution[i] = (i - last_position[num]) * (n - i) % mod
        sum = (sum + contribution[i]) % mod
        last_position[num] = i
    end

    prefix_sum = Array.new(n, 0)
    prefix_sum[0] = contribution[0]
    (1...n).each { |i| prefix_sum[i] = (prefix_sum[i-1] + contribution[i]) % mod }

    result = 0
    last_position.clear
    nums.each_with_index do |num, i|
        if last_position[num] != -1
            result = (result + prefix_sum[i] - prefix_sum[last_position[num]]) % mod
        else
            result = (result + prefix_sum[i]) % mod
        end
        last_position[num] = i
    end

    result
end
